page.title: 20DALWOOD PLAYGROUP.
page.content: There has been a playgroup in Dalwood for over ten years. It was started to support the school when the school was threatened with closure due to falling rolls. The playgroup is held at the village hall on Tuesdays and Fridays. Until recently the playgroup was run by Mrs Rose Mock. It is now run by Mrs Sandy Thorne, assisted by Mrs Jenny Sampson and Mrs Diana Darke. Activities include creative and constructional play,drama and music. At present there are ten children attending the playgroup. Some children come from outside Dalwood. The playgroup is affiliated to the National Playgroups Association.
